forecast.name: Tonight

weather_report:
As the dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, an enveloping cloud cover whispers hints of chill, leaving behind a pleasant coolness in the air. The temperature hovers gracefully around fifty-two, accompanied by a brisk west wind that plays gently with the layers of fog and marine layer, teasing the edges of the cityscape. While visibility might feel limited, this veil of clouds often hints at the exhilaration of a flavorful evening, inviting strollers to don light jackets and relish the city's enchanting allure.

Tomorrow teases with the promise of bright sunshine, beckoning residents to shed the layers as temperatures flirt with a comfortable sixty-eight. A light breeze will continue to carry the scent of the sea, making it an ideal day for simple pleasures—perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero, admiring the graceful sway of the bay, or enjoying a quiet cup of coffee at a sidewalk café. For those with a fondness for nature, a leisurely visit to Golden Gate Park will blossom with vibrant colors and the gentle buzz of life as San Francisco welcomes the warmth of the sun.
